subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Adrian Beltre homered twice, and Rougned Odor added a three-run homer for the Rangers, who stayed a game ahead of Minnesota for the A.L.’s second wild-card spot.
snippet: Adrian Beltre homered twice, and Rougned Odor added a three-run homer for the Rangers, who stayed a game ahead of Minnesota for the A.L.’s second wild-card spot.
